name: Ash of War: Spinning Slash
caption: Skill favored by dexterous warriors.
info:
Spin in place to carve every foe around you, then repeat the input to hurl yourself forward into another whirling slash that continues the assault. When equipped on the Dragon Halberd, the follow-up strike releases ice lightning that adds <font color="#FFE033">Lightning damage</font>, <font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite</font> buildup, and 10 extra <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> to every hit. Cannot be parried when consuming <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (throwing blades):</font> 13
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (daggers):</font> 20
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (halberds/reapers/spears):</font> 26
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (greatswords/curved greatswords/greataxes/great spears):</font> 29
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (straight swords/curved swords/backhand blades/katanas/axes):</font> 33
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (light greatswords):</font> 36

name: Ash of War: Loretta's Slash
caption: Skill of Loretta the Royal Knight.
info:
Leap forward while cloaking the blade in glintstone, then dive into a sweeping slash as you land to catch distant foes. Each follow-up inherits any weapon buffs already on the armament. Cannot be parried.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (leap):</font> 12
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (finisher):</font> 10
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (total):</font> 22

name: Ash of War: Storm Assault
caption: One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil.
info: Wrap yourself in a cyclone, leap forward, and drive the armament into the ground to detonate another spiral of storm winds at the point of impact. The takeoff gust damages foes around you before the diving thrust lands, and the swirling winds linger briefly to pin targets in place.

name: Ash of War: Stormcaller
caption: One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil.
info:
Spin the armament to surround yourself with storm winds, then repeat the input up to two times to step forward and unfold wider cyclones. Cannot be parried when consuming <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (initial sweep):</font> 24
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (first follow-up):</font> 12
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (second follow-up):</font> 12

name: Ash of War: Glintblade Phalanx
caption: Skill used by the enchanted knights who served the Carian royal family.
info:
Conjure four magical dagger projectiles overhead; they hover defensively before automatically launching at the nearest enemy once they enter range. Following up with a strong attack chains the skill into a lunging thrust, and the glintblades can even track invisible foes so long as they have a clear path. Each blade shatters the instant it touches any geometry, so casting in tight quarters can waste the shots.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (projectiles):</font> 47

name: Ash of War: Flaming Strike
caption: A blazing knight's art forged amid battlefields wreathed in flame.
info:
Sweep your off-hand to send out a short arc of flame, then follow up with a lunging slash that cuts through the blaze and coats the armament in fire. The follow-up buff adds 90 <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font> to the weapon for 40 seconds regardless of its affinity, but attempting the skill with no <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> produces no flame, fails to apply the buff, and greatly weakens the follow-up. The ignition wave cannot be parried although the lunging slash can.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (projectile):</font> 138
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (both hits):</font> 15

name: Ash of War: Parry
caption: A foundational deflection art shared by warriors across the Lands Between.
info:
Swing your armament with precise timing to deflect an incoming melee attack, breaking the enemy stance and usually opening them to a critical hit. Only certain melee attacks can be parried, and the timing window changes with the armament performing the skill.

On small shields Parry has 4 start-up frames and 5 active parry frames at 30 FPS (double at 60 FPS). Daggers share 4 start-up frames and 4 parry frames, while medium shields, thrusting swords, curved swords, fists, and claws have 4 start-up frames and 2 parry frames at 30 FPS, demanding stricter timing.

name: Ash of War: Buckler Parry
info:
Take a braced stance with the buckler and flick it out just before impact to deflect the attack, breaking the enemy stance and typically allowing a critical hit. Only parryable melee attacks can be turned aside, so spacing and timing still matter.

Buckler Parry keeps the small-shield timing of 4 start-up frames and 5 active parry frames at 30 FPS (double at 60 FPS) but its deflection point occurs slightly earlier, letting you answer fast swings more reliably.

name: Ash of War: Parry
info:
Use precise timing to swat aside a melee attack and stagger the foe, setting up a critical riposte if you are close enough. Only parryable melee strings can be deflected, so recognizing an opponent's moveset is key.

Small shields share 4 frames of start-up and 5 active parry frames at 30 FPS, daggers share 4 frames of start-up and 4 active frames, and medium shields, thrusting swords, curved swords, fists, and claws only give 2 active parry frames after the same 4-frame start-up.

name: Ash of War: Storm Wall
caption: Tempest-born shield art of Stormveil's sentries.
info:
Swing the shield to raise a short wall of storm winds that flicks away small physical projectiles and can also parry melee attacks to break an enemy stance.

The projectile deflection activates instantly and grants 10 active frames, while the melee parry has 4 start-up frames and 5 active parry frames at 30 FPS (double at 60 FPS). Always consumes <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> even if nothing is deflected, and it only reflects lighter physical shots - great arrows and other heavy projectiles will still break through.

name: Ash of War: Thops's Barrier
caption: A protective sigil devised by Thops for his earnest pupils.
info:
Swing the shield through a conjured sigil to nullify an incoming sorcery or incantation, or parry a melee attack to break an enemy stance. The barrier appears after 3 start-up frames and grants 5 active parry frames at 30 FPS (double at 60 FPS), giving it a slightly later but tighter window than a small-shield parry while remaining identical regardless of the armament using it.
Only parryable melee strings and hostile spells can be reflected, but the barrier's timing stays consistent on every shield.

name: Ash of War: Enchanted Shot
caption: Archery technique of enchanted knights.
info:
Hold the bow in a steady stance to infuse the next arrow with guiding essence, causing it to fly faster than normal, curve toward its target, and reach farther. While this stance is active each shot deals 50% more damage, builds 50% more status with every hit, and costs 50% more <font color="#E0B985">stamina</font> than a regular arrow, but it still cannot pierce shields the way Mighty Shot does.

Used without <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>, the arrow loses its tracking, speed boost, and damage bonus, leaving only a 5% increase over a normal shot.

name: Ash of War: Sky Shot
caption: An archery trick for hunters who stalk from cover.
info:
Crouch in a low stance to fire an arrow almost straight upward so it rains down on the spot where the target stood when released, often registering as a headshot and clearing low cover along the way.

Shots fired this way deal 33% more damage than a normal arrow. Holding the stance slows <font color="#E0B985">stamina regeneration</font> by roughly 80% and ends immediately if you move, and because the arrow locks on to the original location it is far easier to use against unaware or stationary foes; shots against a target's back tend to hit the neck for reduced damage.

name: Ash of War: Rain of Arrows
caption: A volley method taught to skirmishing bowmen.
info:
Hold to crouch in a low archery stance, firing each shot nearly straight up so it splits into a rain that lands where the target stood.

Each barrage deals 50% of the arrow's normal damage and status buildup per projectile but can strike targets multiple times before the effect ends. The skill can be activated as long as you have at least 1 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> remaining.

name: Ash of War: Storm Stomp
caption: One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil.
info:
Stomp to summon a tight cyclone that hits around you, keeping foes locked in hitstun and setting up follow-up attacks with the bound armament. Cannot be parried.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (wind):</font> 50
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage:</font> 6

name: Ash of War: Kick
caption: A blunt, no-frills tactic favored by roughneck fighters.
info:
Deliver a fast, high kick that instantly staggers guarding enemies, opening them to a guard break while you are bare-handed in either hand. Cannot be parried.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage:</font> 6

name: Ash of War: Dryleaf Whirlwind
caption: This skill represents the pinnacle of Dane's footwork-based martial artistry.
info:
Leap upward in a cyclone of four rapid kicks before driving a final heel drop into the ground, extending the reach of all kicking attacks with <font color="#E0B985">arcane</font> force and triggering multi-hit effects.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (with FP):</font> 28
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (without FP):</font> 16

name: Ash of War: Aspects of the Crucible: Wings
caption: Aspects of the Crucible (Wings): This skill originates from the lifeforms of the Crucible.
info:
Manifest Crucible wings, take flight, and dive weapon-first into the target; twinblades replace the thrust with an eight-spin charge.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (colossal swords):</font> 24
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (greatswords/light greatswords/heavy thrusting swords/great spears/great katanas):</font> 22
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (twinblades/straight swords/katanas/spears/halberds):</font> 20
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (thrusting swords):</font> 16
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (daggers):</font> 12
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (throwing daggers):</font> 8

name: Ash of War: Spinning Gravity Thrust
caption: A gravity skill honed by the disciples of an Alabaster Lord.
info:
Use gravity to hover in place, rotate, and drive forward with a piercing thrust, then input again to crash down in another spinning strike that knocks foes back. Triggers multi-hit effects.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (greatswords/curved greatswords/heavy thrusting swords/great katanas - first thrust):</font> 21
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (greatswords/curved greatswords/heavy thrusting swords/great katanas - follow-up):</font> 25
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (colossal swords - first thrust):</font> 23
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (colossal swords - follow-up):</font> 26

name: Ash of War: Palm Blast
caption: Skill of the spiritual seekers known as the Dryleaf Sect.
info:
Gather energy in your palm before unleashing an explosive strike that travels slightly past your reach; charging widens the blast, knocks enemies away, spreads the weapon's status buildup across the area, and greatly boosts <font color="#E0B985">poise</font> while charging.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage:</font> 20
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (charged):</font> 36

name: Ash of War: Piercing Throw
caption: A duelist's signature toss refined to answer distant challengers.
info:
Hurl the armament with a powerful spin to tunnel through every foe in its path and reach roughly double the normal range, retaining full damage on each pierce while blocking still prevents damage even as the projectile keeps traveling. Used without <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>, damage is reduced and piercing is removed.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage:</font> 3

name: Ash of War: Scattershot Throw
caption: A smithing boast that claims a dagger can be mirrored at will.
info:
Conjure mirrored copies of the dagger in both hands and fling a cloud of 28 projectiles that can strike large foes up to four times each, then repeat with a second input. The daggers count as pierce damage for counter bonuses such as Spear Talisman, gain roughly 50% more range than normal throws, and add an extra close-range hitbox. Using it without <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> throws only two daggers but retains the extended range.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (per volley):</font> 11

name: Ash of War: Wall of Sparks
caption: Perfumer art born from experiments with volatile powder.
info:
Scatter perfumed powder around you that ignites after a short delay into a wall of intense sparks, with the element determined by the perfume bottle. Charging widens the wall, increases damage, and the sparks cannot be parried.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (per explosion):</font> 3

name: Ash of War: Rolling Sparks
caption: Perfumer technique that lets volatile incense wander on its own.
info:
Spread perfumed powder in a rolling line that erupts into successive explosions of sparks, inheriting the bottle's properties. Large targets can be struck multiple times along the trail, and the line stops releasing hits if it collides with terrain.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (per explosion):</font> 3

name: Ash of War: Raging Beast
caption: Beastlike footwork born of feral hunts.
info:
Dash in any direction with beastlike speed, vault upward, and rake the enemy with an aerial slash before diving into a follow-up strike with a strong-attack input. The evasive step grants 6 invulnerability frames.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (opening slash):</font> 6
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (follow-up plunge):</font> 11

name: Ash of War: Savage Claws
caption: A feral claw style taught to hunters who emulate beasts.
info:
Pounce on the target and rake it with six alternating claw swipes in rapid succession. Each swipe applies 60% of the weapon's status buildup.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (6-hit combo):</font> 22

name: Ash of War: Blind Spot
caption: A duelist's feint that exploits an enemy's blind side.
info:
Dash to either side of a target before executing a piercing stab that slips beneath their guard, with the input determining which flank you strike from. The dash grants 6 invulnerability frames, and the stab's <font color="#F395C4">pierce damage</font> ignores blocking.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (stab):</font> 10

name: Ash of War: Swift Slash
caption: A skill passed down amongst hornsent swordsmen.
info:
Step forward with a razor-quick cut that slices through foes and fires a shearing vacuum, gaining power and lunge distance when charged. The vacuum's repeated hits rapidly build status.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (uncharged slash):</font> 10
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (charged slash):</font> 20

name: Ash of War: Overhead Stance
caption: A disciplined guard preserved by swordsmen who seek a single telling strike.
info:
Enter a high guard, then perform a stepping downward slash with a light attack or unleash a series of plunging blows with a strong attack. Counts as a stance skill.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (light follow-up):</font> 11
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (heavy series):</font> 22

name: Ash of War: Wing Stance
caption: A poised form that spreads like a wing before the strike.
info:
Hold a <font color="#E0B985">poise</font>d right-sided guard before releasing a rapid three-slash light combo or a leaping heavy thrust. The light chain can loop with minimal delay if you hold the button, while the heavy thrust hops over low attacks without counting as a jumping attack. Can be parried.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (light chain):</font> 17
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (heavy thrust):</font> 30

name: Ash of War: Blinkbolt
caption: Skill used by the golden knights who served Godwyn.
info:
Transform into a bolt of lightning from a low stance and rush straight ahead even when locked onto a target. Deals minimal <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font> while surging forward and, after 14 frames of startup, grants 16 invulnerability frames that let you ignore incoming attacks.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage:</font> 1

name: Ash of War: Flame Skewer
caption: Skill of Queelign of the Fire Knights.
info:
Enwreathe the armament in fire, dip into a low stance, and skewer the target in one thrust, with a strong-attack follow-up that fans flames across the front. The buff adds 95 <font color="#F48C25">fire attack rating</font> for 15 seconds, and the first thrust can be parried.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (colossal swords - thrust):</font> 24
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (greatswords/greatspears/great katanas/heavy thrusting swords/thrusting shields - thrust):</font> 22
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (straight swords/halberds/spears/twinblades/katanas - thrust):</font> 20
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (thrusting swords - thrust):</font> 16
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (follow-up flames):</font> 15

name: Ash of War: Savage Lion's Claw
caption: Skill of the particularly brave, even among the Redmanes.
info:
Somersault forward, landing a weaker Lion's Claw slash, a regular attack during the flip, and a finishing Lion's Claw slam, with an additional input enabling the final strike. Each hit inherits your weapon's damage type.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (colossal weapons):</font> 64
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (great hammers):</font> 60
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (hammers):</font> 55
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (colossal swords/flails):</font> 51
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (greatswords/light greatswords/greataxes/great katanas/curved greatswords):</font> 47
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (straight swords/axes/twinblades/katanas/curved swords):</font> 43

name: Ash of War: Divine Beast Frost Stomp
caption: A skill which imitates the wrath of the divine beast's dance.
info:
Raise a leg high before stomping to send a ground-hugging wave of frost forward that detonates into spikes and ice explosions along its path. Charging increases the wave's range and power while dealing <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font>.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage:</font> 5
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (charged):</font> 10
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (spikes):</font> 70
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (explosions):</font> 70

name: Ash of War: Flame Spear
caption: Skill of Kood, captain of the Fire Knights.
info:
Ready a thrust imbued with flame before unleashing a fiery spear straight ahead, gaining damage and travel distance when you charge the attack. Adds 95 <font color="#F48C25">fire attack rating</font> for 40 seconds and sends the flame projectile as soon as the thrust fires. The weapon hit can be parried.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (colossal swords):</font> 38
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (greatswords/greatspears/great katanas/heavy thrusting swords/thrusting shields):</font> 36
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (straight swords/halberds/spears/twinblades/katanas):</font> 33
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (thrusting swords):</font> 28
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (daggers):</font> 22

name: Ash of War: Carian Sovereignty
caption: Skill passed down the Carian royal family.
info:
Transform the blade into a massive magical greatsword and slam it down, with an additional input producing a horizontal sweep; either attack can be charged for greater force. A fully charged slam releases a ground shockwave that fires two bursts in a line for about 40% of the slam's damage each, and a single foe cannot be hit by both the slam and the bursts. The follow-up sweep matches the initial cast in raw damage. All hits deal pure <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font> that scales with <font color="#E0B985">Intelligence</font>, weapon upgrade level, and infusion, and the skill provides significant hyper armor while casting ranging from 118 <font color="#E0B985">poise</font> on greatswords to 22 on daggers.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (charged slam):</font> 48
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (charged follow-up sweep):</font> 45

name: Ash of War: Shriek of Sorrow
caption: Skill utilized by the downtrodden.
info: Unleash a harrowing scream that makes nearby foes flinch before channeling resentment into your weapon for 40 seconds based on your remaining HP. The buff locks in at the HP when cast, increases <font color="#F395C4">physical damage</font> by 10% at 100% HP, 15% at 85% HP, 20% at 55% HP, and 25% at 30% HP or lower (7.5%, 10%, 15%, and 20% in PvP), and adds +5 <font color="#E0B985">Strength</font> scaling to the weapon until you recast. Cannot be parried and counts as a weapon buff, so it will not stack with other buffs such as greases.

name: Ash of War: Ghostflame Call
info:
Drive the armament forward to manifest a burst of <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font> ghostflame that applies 20 <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font>. A light attack follow-up leaves a burning trail that inflicts 20 per tick, while a strong attack enlarges the explosion to 80. All variants also apply the weapon hit <font color="#E0B985">poise damage</font> on the opening thrust.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (no-input explosion):</font> 4
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (light follow-up):</font> 5
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (heavy follow-up):</font> 11
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (no-input explosion):</font> 20
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (trail, per tick):</font> 20
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (heavy explosion):</font> 80

name: Ash of War: The Poison Flower Blooms Twice
info:
Conjure a stinger underfoot to stab the enemy, creating a shockwave on impact. If the stung enemy is already inflicted with any <font color="#40BF40">poison</font> or <font color="#EF7676">rot</font>, deal an extra 5% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 250 damage to them and purge the ailment.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (stab):</font> 150
<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (shockwave):</font> 70
<font color="#EF7676">Base scarlet rot accumulation:</font> 160

name: Ash of War: Igon's Drake Hunt
caption: Skill of Igon, drake warrior.
info:
Roar from behind your guard to drive a shield bash that erupts in a wide shockwave, knocking back and staggering surrounding foes.
Freyja's Greatsword increases this skill's damage by 10% while roar damage buffs have no effect.

name: Ash of War: Shield Strike
caption: A battle-hardened guard art for fighters who trust their shields more than blades.
info:
Bash forward with the equipped shield and input repeatedly to chain up to three additional shield strikes.

When assigned off-hand it gives the shield its own light attack string so you can keep the main-hand skill.
